summary: Replaces the wood texture from the mannequinns with real skin, a face, etc. so it looks like a real person.
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the wood texture from the mannequinns with real skin, a face, etc. so it looks like a real person.

Installation:
===================
Copy the meshes and textures folder into you skyrim \\data\\ folder.


De-Install:
===================
Delete the copied files from your skyrim Data folder.

There\'s a version of the mannequinn with Tattoos, and one without.
The Tattoo Credits go to: Grend (from his Tattoo body Mod)

Instruction for no Tattoo Mannequinn:
======================================
To have the mannequinn without tattoos, simply go into the textures\\actors\\character\\manekin Folder of the downloaded file, and rename the file \"manakinbodym_plain.dds\" to \"manakinbodym.dds\" (overwriting the one allready present, which is the tattoo version).


\"Bug\": if there\'s nothing on the head, the face texture can be seen wrapped around the rest of the head... (not really a big deal, but if somebody has an idea to fix that, tell me so)

Enjoy

-rioc
author: -rioc
